fights.name: The Unending Coil of Bahamut (Ultimate)
fights.description: The first Ultimate raid in FFXIV, featuring multiple phases from the original Binding Coil series. Unlocked through 'The Ultimate Coil' quest from the Wandering Minstrel in Kugane after clearing O4S.

fights.name: The Weapon's Refrain (Ultimate)
fights.description: Ultimate version combining Garuda, Ifrit, and Titan in a single encounter. Unlocked through 'The Weapon's Refrain' quest from the Wandering Minstrel in Kugane after clearing O8S.

fights.name: The Epic of Alexander (Ultimate)
fights.description: Ultimate raid featuring bosses from the Alexander raid series. Unlocked through 'The Epic of Alexander' quest from the Wandering Minstrel in the Crystarium after clearing E4S.

fights.name: Dragonsong's Reprise (Ultimate)
fights.description: Ultimate raid based on the Heavensward storyline featuring King Thordan and Nidhogg. Unlocked through 'Dragonsong's Reprise' quest from the Wandering Minstrel in Old Sharlayan after clearing P4S.

fights.name: The Omega Protocol (Ultimate)
fights.description: Ultimate raid featuring Omega from the Stormblood raid series. Unlocked through 'The Omega Protocol' quest from the Wandering Minstrel in Old Sharlayan after clearing P8S.

fights.name: Futures Rewritten (Ultimate)
fights.description: The latest Ultimate raid from Dawntrail expansion. Unlocked through 'Futures Rewritten' quest from the Wandering Minstrel in Solution Nine after clearing M4S.
